items.title: Some of the Ways We Brought the Criminal Justice System to Life Through Visuals in 2025
items.description: Through evocative illustrations and photography, we tackled themes of deplorable prison conditions, healing after gun violence and deaths in custody.

items.title: What’s So Scary About Treatable Conditions Behind Bars?
items.description: Medicines, procedures, and specialists can be scarce in prison, or people don’t get them until it’s too late.

items.title: It’s Hard to Grieve in Prison. This Guide Can Help
items.description: From breathing exercises to journaling prompts, we compiled steps that help with processing difficult emotions while locked up.

items.title: Missouri Journalists: How to Access the State Prison System’s Comprehensive Death Data
items.description: The Missouri Department of Corrections generated its first report with every prison death in its system. Here’s how to use it.

items.title: How a Public Record Cost Cuyahoga County Taxpayers $650,000
items.description: A worker’s demotion after releasing court records to The Marshall Project - Cleveland led to a lawsuit alleging retaliation and witness intimidation.
